title: trilinos@13.0.1: cmake: MiniTensor has required library dependence on disabled TPL Boost!
body:
Building `trilinos@13.0.1 +amesos +amesos2 +anasazi +aztec +belos +epetra +epetraext +ifpack +ifpack2 +intrepid +intrepid2 +isorropia +kokkos +ml +minitensor +muelu +nox +piro +phalanx +rol +rythmos +sacado +stk +shards +shylu +stokhos +stratimikos +teko +tempus +tpetra +trilinoscouplings +zoltan +zoltan2 +superlu-dist gotype=long` fails at CMake stage using:
* `spack@develop` (889ece85ed4d9305a5b47863ee9579d67ff6a1b2 from `Tue Jul 20 14:58:54 2021 +0200`)

Concrete spec: [trilinos.spec.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6849636/trilinos.spec.yaml.txt)
Build log: [trilinos-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6849637/trilinos-build-out.txt)

```
$> spack spec -y trilinos@13.0.1 +amesos +amesos2 +anasazi +aztec +belos +epetra +epetraext +ifpack +ifpack2 +intrepid +intrepid2 +isorropia +kokkos +ml +minitensor +muelu +nox +piro +phalanx +rol +rythmos +sacado +stk +shards +shylu +stokhos +stratimikos +teko +tempus +tpetra +trilinoscouplings +zoltan +zoltan2 +superlu-dist gotype=long > trilinos.spec.yaml

$> spack install -f ./trilinos.spec.yaml
...
```
